title: Should You Hire Someone to Manage Your Money? The Truth Revealed
subtitle: Exploring whether hiring a professional money manager is necessary or if low-cost index funds may be the better option for your financial success.
content:
Should You Hire Someone to Manage Your Money?

Depends, on what? Do you feel lucky?

According to Morningstar, only one in four active managers actually beat their respective index over the last decade.

You suggest low-cost index funds instead? Suggest nothing.

Except for staying at Bally's when you're in Vegas, because you actually get to look down at the Bellagio fountains and it's a lot cheaper than staying at the Bellagio.
